alert.note: Alert for Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 10:23AM CDT until April 20 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Cass and Richland Counties. Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Goose River at Hillsboro affecting Traill County. Forest River at Minto affecting Walsh County. Maple River near Enderlin affecting Cass and Ransom Counties. Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. Pembina River at Neche affecting Pembina County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in North Dakota... Pembina River at Walhalla affecting Cavalier and Pembina Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Forest River at Minto. * WHEN...Until Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.5 feet, Old Highway 81 is underwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Tuesday was 8.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 2.7 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
